dct_title_s: Nouveau plan de la ville de Rome
dct_description_sm: Birds-eye-view. Plate 18 from: Atlas historique, ou, Nouvelle introduction à l'histoire, à la chronologie & à la géographie ancienne & moderne ... Tome 1 / par Mr. C.*** Oriented with north to the left. Includes index to woks of art and points of interest, ill. of prominent buildings and inset of the environs of rome.
